Title: The Hidden Face
Writer: Andrés Baiz (screenplay), Arturo Infante (story), Hatem Khraiche (story), Hatem Khraiche
Actors: Quim Gutiérrez, Martina García, María Soledad Rodríguez, Jose Luis Garcia
Plot: Shattered by the unexpected news of their irreversible break-up, an aspiring orchestra conductor is puzzled by his girlfriend's mysterious and seemingly inexplicable case of disappearance. But, can he look beyond the facts?
